title: Google Maps Business Scraper
description: Stealth Playwright scraper for Google Maps business profiles with optional reviews and images.

searchQueries.title: Search Queries
searchQueries.description: List of Google Maps search queries (e.g., 'cardiologist in New York', 'coffee shop seattle').

maxResults.title: Max Results per Query
maxResults.description: Maximum businesses to extract for each query (1-500).

includeReviews.title: Extract Reviews Snippets
includeReviews.description: Collect up to 10 recent review snippets when available.

includeImages.title: Collect Images
includeImages.description: Capture up to 5 image URLs per place.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Parallel browser pages (balance speed vs. blocking).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (residential recommended) for Google Maps stability.
